title: Claiming Ciaran
description: Life is good for werewolf Drew and his half-demon lover, Ciaran. They’re beginning to fit into their small town, and slowly making friends. When Ciaran gets a job, things are almost perfect. Then a series of strange, unsettling events disrupts their tranquil life, and Drew fears enemies from the past will destroy the life they’re building before it really begins.
author: Cassandra Gold
